scene_description_enriched: A woman, dressed in a golden-orange gown and a white headdress, is depicted kneeling on a patterned floor. She is seated on an ornate, carved wooden throne or chair. To her right, a large wooden cross is prominently displayed. The background features architectural elements, including niches with sculpted figures and a vaulted ceiling with decorative patterns. The overall scene suggests a devotional or religious context, possibly representing a saint or a figure in prayer, with the cross symbolizing Christian faith.
